name: Click It (FGLDev)
description: Click It was created for an artwork by a teenager in Brazil, in this case me.The theme of the work was interactive arts, and I already had a prototype ready for presentation, but due to the time limit and as there would be no time click it was createdto serve as a stopgap, but it ended up being something much better that beat my expectations.Click it was created with the aim of being a simple game for a school project. (alert, this was translated with google translator)
